meanings.definition: Of or relating to an icon
meanings.sent1: The painting had an iconical image of a famous leader.
meanings.sent2: The museum displayed many iconical artworks.
meanings.sent3: The iconical statue seemed to wink at passersby.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as iconical as the Mona Lisa's.
meanings.sent5: The flag's colors were so iconical, they stood out in the crowd.

meanings.definition: Resembling or characteristic of an icon
meanings.sent1: The actor's outfit was iconical of a famous movie character.
meanings.sent2: Her hairstyle was so iconical, many tried to imitate it.
meanings.sent3: The cake's layers were iconical of a towering skyscraper.
meanings.sent4: His voice was as iconical as a rock star's.
meanings.sent5: The old car had an iconical design that turned heads.

meanings.definition: Symbolic or representative of something iconic
meanings.sent1: The crown was an iconical symbol of royalty.
meanings.sent2: The handshake was iconical of their agreement.
meanings.sent3: The giant cake was iconical of a celebration gone overboard.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was as iconical as a bell ringing.
meanings.sent5: The bridge's arches were so iconical, they became a landmark.
